posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jim Dale
To complete this 36 card set (forgoing the 4 hardest) I still need the hardest - a Broadleaf 460 and also a Uzit, a Carolina Brights and Blank Back card...anyone have any of these graded please let me know.  Thanks, Jim

Posted By: Hank
Hi Jim,

I have a few T206 blank backs available: commom, HOF & Southern League. Some are SGC Authentic with Blank Back designation and they look great. Others are raw.
Let me know if you're interested in more details.

Hank
